Generating Documentation for HTTP Endpoints in a Spring Application
relationships.tail: Demonstrates generating API documentation for a Spring application's HTTP endpoints using Spring REST Docs. Guides through creating a Spring application with REST endpoints, testing the web layer with JUnit and MockMvc, generating Asciidoctor snippets from tests, and integrating documentation into the build process with Maven or Gradle. Includes configuration of Spring Boot, usage of @SpringBootTest and @WebMvcTest annotations, and leveraging MockMvcRestDocumentation to produce curl, HTTPie, and request/response snippets. Emphasizes maintaining up-to-date documentation through automated tests.
